mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, MY.* FROM( SELECT P.PRJ_NO , P.USER_NO , P.PRJ_NAME , P.OPEN_YN , P.ACTIVATE_YN , P.PERIOD , P.START_DATE , TO_CHAR(P.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_CHAR(P.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , D.DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM PROJECT P JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (D.DEPARTMENT_NO = P.DEPART_NO) WHERE DEPART_NO = #{departNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ) MY ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{vo.startRow} AND #{vo.endRow}

SELECT P.PRJ_NO , P.USER_NO , U.NAME , P.PRJ_NAME , P.OPEN_YN , P.ACTIVATE_YN , P.PERIOD , P.START_DATE , TO_CHAR(P.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_CHAR(P.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , D.DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM PROJECT P JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (D.DEPARTMENT_NO = P.DEPART_NO) JOIN IAG_USER U ON (U.USER_NO = P.USER_NO) WHERE PRJ_NO = #{prjNo}

SELECT P.REPORT_NO , P.PRJ_NO , P.USER_NO , U.NAME , U.PROFILE , P.REPORT_TYPE , P.REPORT_NAME , P.REPORT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(P.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') CREATE_DATE , TO_CHAR(P.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') START_DATE , TO_CHAR(P.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') END_DATE , P.PERIOD , P.LOCATION FROM PRJ_REPORT P JOIN IAG_USER U ON (U.USER_NO = P.USER_NO) WHERE P.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND P.PRJ_NO = #{prjNo} ORDER BY P.CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRJ_REPORT WHERE PRJ_NO = #{prjNo} AND REPORT_TYPE = 'G' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRJ_REPORT WHERE PRJ_NO = #{prjNo} AND REPORT_TYPE = 'C' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRJ_REPORT WHERE PRJ_NO = #{prjNo} AND REPORT_TYPE = 'W' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT P.REPORT_NO , P.PRJ_NO , P.USER_NO , U.NAME , U.PROFILE , P.REPORT_TYPE , P.REPORT_NAME , P.REPORT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(P.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') CREATE_DATE , TO_CHAR(P.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') START_DATE , TO_CHAR(P.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') END_DATE , P.PERIOD , P.LOCATION FROM PRJ_REPORT P JOIN IAG_USER U ON (U.USER_NO = P.USER_NO) WHERE P.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND P.PRJ_NO = #{prjNo} AND P.REPORT_TYPE = #{reportType} ORDER BY P.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT PR.REPORT_NAME , TO_CHAR(PR.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') START_DATE , TO_CHAR(PR.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') END_DATE FROM PRJ_REPORT PR JOIN PROJECT P ON (P.PRJ_NO = PR.PRJ_NO) WHERE P.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND P.DEPART_NO = #{departNo}
